text: mmm did I just drop sticky rice on the
floor hi guys it's angel I know it's
been a while I haven't been ignoring you
guys I've just been sick these past few
weeks and I've been waiting for my voice
to recover it's not a hundred percent as
you can probably tell but I've miss
cooking and I miss making videos so I am
back in the kitchen today and we are
going to be making a breakfast sticky
rice recipe called fun Tuan now if
you're not familiar with Funt one it's
actually super popular for breakfast in
Taiwan a lot of street vendors make it
it's kind of a grab-and-go breakfast
it's super filling really satisfying and
really good and surprisingly as I read
through the YouTube comments a lot of
you have had fun fun before and have
requested this recipe so if you are
interested in learning how to make this
at home
keep watching alright for the
ingredients we are going to need some
sweet rice also known as glutinous rice
now today I got two types of sweet rice
I got the regular white sweet rice and
then I also got some purple rice which
is super popular in Taiwan it's actually
black rice but when you cook it it turns
the color purple so it makes it really
really interesting and if you're
wondering why I'm mixing the rice it's
because I feel like the purple rice is a
little bit more hearty and chewier while
the white rice is a lot more sticky so I
feel like it's the best of both worlds
in addition to the rice we will also
need some pork floss which is just dried
shredded pork and if you're not familiar
with what that looks like they sell them
in containers like this I will also post
links in the video description below and
we will also need some Chinese donut you
can use my Chinese donut recipe that I
have or you can also buy them from your
local Asian grocery store and bake them
or deep-fry them when you're ready to
use
once you have all these ingredients
prepared we're now ready to cook our
rice the easiest way to make this is in
a rice cooker and I'm using 1 cup of
white and 1 cup of purple rice which I'm
washing a few times in there cold water
and then when I'm done washing I'm going
to add enough filtered water to the rice
cooker bowl up to the line that says
sweet rice next we're going to let the
rice soak for 15 minutes first before
putting it in the rice cooker and this
will give a time to absorb the water and
become stickier now once the rice is
done cooking which usually takes about
an hour
give it some gentle fluffing and recover
and let it stand in the rice cooker for
a few minutes this will make it fluffier
now it's time to make our sticky rice
roll prepare a sheet of plastic wrap and
place it neatly on your countertop then
take a spoonful of the rice and flatten
it into a rectangular shape feel free to
add more rice as needed to ensure all
the corners are even next I'm going to
take half of the Chinese donut and split
that piece into two place one piece of
the donut into the center of the sticky
rice and finally add a few spoonfuls of
the pork floss roll the sticky rice
tightly around the fillings using the
plastic wrap to help you and roll and
press firmly together then unwrap and
you're done and that is how easy it is
to make a sticky rice roll

rice it's sticky

of taste the flavors of all the pork
floss it's salty and savory and sweet
it's really really good and kind of just
balances everything out it's super good
and as you can see it's like kind of a
